titleStmt.title: A proclamation concernynge eatyng of vvhyte meates made the . ix. day of February, the XXXIIII. yere of the reygne of the kynges most royall maiesty.
Proclamations. 1542-04-22
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Thomas Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: Because of fish scarcity, temporarily dispenses with laws of abstinence from milk, butter, eggs, and cheese during Lent.
Reproductions of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
